description: This file defines the Animals React component for the wildlife monitoring system, implementing listing, viewing, creating, updating, and deleting animal records, along with telemetry visualization.

methods.name: loadAnimals
methods.description: Fetches the list of animals from the backend API and updates the component state.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of an animal, fetching detailed info from API.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new animal record via API and refreshes the list.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates an existing animal record via API.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes an animal record after user confirmation and refreshes the list.

search-terms: React component for animals list and details
